definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Grinnell College (private liberal arts college in Grinnell, Iowa, USA)
pinyin: Ge2 lin2 nai4 er3 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: Biologists use the binomial system of nomenclature developed by Linnaeus to categorize the varieties of life on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 生物學家利用林奈發展的雙名法對生物分類。

sentences.english: The epidermis has been replaced by periderm on the surface of stem.
sentences.chinese: 林奈木莖的表面，表皮層已被周皮所代替。

sentences.english: Linnaeus declared that each species had existed since creation.
sentences.chinese: 林奈宣稱，自從神造萬物以後，這些物種就一直存在。
